original_text: Later, the five silly women also came to the house. They said, “Sir, Sir, please open the door for us.”
korean_text: 그 후에 남은 처녀들이 와서 이르되 주여 주여 우리에게 열어 주소서

sentences.original_text: Later, the five silly women also came to the house.
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에, 어리석은 다섯 여자들도 집으로 왔다.

sentences.original_text: “Sir, Sir, please open the door for us.”
